title: The 5 best weekend deals you can get on Amazon
text:
The 5 best weekend deals you can get on Amazon

We hunted down the best deals on Amazon this weekend, so don't miss out. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

It's hard to believe that next week is Halloween already! I love spooky season as much as the next person, but when I online shop, I don't want any tricks, just treats. After all, nothing will haunt you more than knowing you bought a product at full price, when you could've saved a ton of money on it elsewhere.

But that's why I'm here: to scope out the best deals on the internet, so you don't have to. Today, I've found some sales on Amazon that should certainly lift your spirits, pun intended, including discounts on Vitamix blenders, our favorite vacuum cleaners, and more. So go ahead and trick-or-treat yourself to the five best deals on Amazon this Saturday, so you can stop reading my corny Halloween puns.

1. Lowest price ever: Our favorite affordable blender

Blend your way through smoothies and more with this top blender. (Photo: Vitamix)

Whether you want to whip up a morning smoothie, make some thick vegetable soups, or blend up nut butters, salsas, or batters, this popular Vitamix blender can do it all, and right now, you can save a whopping $160 on it and get it for the lowest price we've ever seen. We chose it as our favorite affordable pick when we tested the best professional blenders this year, as we loved its powerful motor and lower height that fits underneath cabinets. While these are astronomically expensive to buy new, it's way more common to buy one of Vitamix's certified reconditioned models, which work just the same. They also come with a five-year warranty and an Amazon renewed guarantee.

Get the Vitamix 5300 Certified Refurbished blender for $199.95 (Save $159.05)

2. Save $13: This massage pillow with a cult-following

This gadget is basically a personal masseuse that you can bring anywhere. (Photo: Zyllion)

Back aches and pains can arise from all sorts of situations, from sitting all day at an uncomfortable desk chair to doing too much yard work. If you're looking for a device to ease some of that muscle strain, look no further than this electric pillow massager by Zyllion. It has a near-perfect 4.5-star rating out of more than 9,000 reviews, with shoppers praising its long-lasting durability, ease of transport, and ability to relieve even the most stubborn knots in their neck, back, and legs. Today, you can snag it at just 45 cents higher than the lowest price we've ever seen, which is a pretty sweet deal.

Get the Zyllion Shiatsu Back and Neck Massager for $31.95 (Save $13)

3. Deal alert: Our favorite traditional vacuum

Save on our favorite traditional vacuum on the market. (Photo: Bissell)

Vacuuming is one of the most tedious and tiresome chores, but it has to be done if you want to keep your floors free of dust bunnies, dirt, and debris. While devices like robot vacuums can be a huge help, you're going to need a traditional vacuum for those deeper cleans. If you want to get our favorite all-around vacuum under $400, go for the Bissell Cleanview, which we think strikes the perfect balance between performance and affordability, as it cleans well across most types of floors, and has solid reviews in terms of reliability and robustness. While already affordable as is, right now you can shave $10 off its price tag and get it for just $89.96.

Get the Bissell Cleanview Vacuum Cleaner for $89.96 (Save $10.03)

4. 10% off: One of our favorite sound machines

Drown out the outside world and fall asleep easier with the LectroFan. (Photo: LectroFan)

There are plenty of things that can keep you from getting a good night's sleep, but to me, the worst is when loud, outside noises are to blame. If you're trying to drown out the sound of the neighbor's crying baby or barking dog, or perhaps just the city noise from your apartment window, one of our favorite sound machines—the Adaptive Sound LectroFan—can be a huge help. It comes with 20 fan and white noise options, and has a beautiful, warm sound profile according to our tester. Plus, at this sale price of $44.95, you can save a fiver on this top-rated gadget that may help you catch those elusive ZZZ's.

Get the Lectrofan High Fidelity Noise Machine for $44.95 (Save $5)

5. Stock up and save: Aquaphor healing ointment

Aquaphor is a medicine cabinet staple, so why not stock up? (Photo: Aquaphor)

As they say in Game of Thrones, winter is coming, and we all need to be prepared. Cold weather and blistery winds can cause dry skin and chapped lips, which is why now's the perfect time to stock up on one of our lifestyle writer's favorite drugstore products, Aquaphor healing ointment. It's the perfect versatile ointment to hydrate skin, protect minor wounds and cuts, or even tame flyaway hairs, so you can't go wrong having a bottle or two lying around, especially when you can get this jar and tube set for $5 cheaper than usual.

Get Aquaphor Healing Ointment jar & tube set for $15.21 (Save $5.07)
